about_the_game:
It’s Halloween night in Carpenter Grove, USA: the kegs are flowing at the costume party and kids are running wild, brawling in the streets.

It’s just another wild Halloween until things take a turn for the worst. With their home under attack, a squad of high school outcasts team up and battle through ten spooktacular stages of explosive side-scrolling beat ‘em up action!

Inspired by old-school brawlers like Streets of Rage and Final Fight, you can unite with up to four friends in co-op and lay the smackdown on a huge cast of ghoulish bad guys in your quest to save Halloween.

Features:

  • Kick it old-school with hard-hitting arcade beat ‘em up combat.
  • Bring the pain as four unique characters, each with their own strengths and special moves.
  • Smash your way through 10 challenging stages, including a costume party and a mutated mansion.
  • Enjoy charming animation and a rocking soundtrack inspired by arcade classics.
  • Rumble with a huge cast of varied enemies that come packing their own savage move-sets.
  • Unique and horrifying bosses and minigames in every stage.
  • Mix it up with different gameplay styles: surf through a haunted swamp, use stealth to survive a dizzying corn maze and more!
  • Squad up with friends in co-op mode, with support for up to four players.
  • Uncover Carpenter Grove’s darkest secret through a mysterious story full of twists, turns and witty dialogue.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core 2 Duo E7500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Halloween gets deadly in this action-packed love letter to retro side-scrolling beat ‘em ups. Bring the smackdown as a squad in co-op mode (up to 4 players) and jam out to a spooky, fist-pumping soundtrack inspired by the finest arcade beat ‘em ups of the ‘90s.
